rationale: Primary flight control surfaces are structural components manufactured in-house with OEM partners
Fuselage primary structure is the core in-house design and manufacturing domain
Engine/nacelle co-developed with propulsion OEM under shared IP agreement
Gas turbine core co-developed with engine OEM; shared qualification programme
Cryogenic H2/NH3/LN2 system is novel technology TRL 3-5; no mature supply chain
Electrical power generation and distribution from mature suppliers; spec-driven procurement
Flight instruments are DO-178C/DO-254 scope; DAL B-C; certified avionics supplier
Navigation systems are DO-178C scope; DAL A-B; certified avionics supplier
Cabin interior is airline-selected buyer-furnished equipment; late configuration
Predictive maintenance and fleet analytics systems; AI/ML model with no established DO standard
